PERSONAL INFORMATION
ADD LANG HA, DONG DA, HANOI
SEX  FEMALE      DATE OF BIRTH 23.7.1986 
NATIONALITY  VIETNAMESE
Trinh Thi Phuong Thao
Marketing & PR Manager
“A creative marketing & communications manager with sharp thinking, sound ideas, 
and strong experience in the field.“
linkedin.com/in/trinhphuongthao
trinhphuongthao86@gmail.com
0912. 994. 661

MARKET RESEARCH
PUBLIC RELATIONS 
CRISIS MANAGEMENT 
DIGITAL PERFORMANCE MARETING
MANAGERMENT & 
LEADERSHIP
CUSTOMER CARE
EVENT MANAGEMENT 
in
Masters degree in Global Media Communication
The University of Melbourne, Victoria, Australia
Acquiring a deep and critical understanding of how media industries, policies 
and technologies are implicated in contemporary social and economics. 
Gaining a global vision about the modern media landscape and how to 
strategically apply in Vietnam context.
Major trained skills:
•Researching audiences and receptions
•Public relation and crisis communication
•Writing for digital media (Blogs, website, social media)
•Digital culture
•Analyzing and planning behavioral change programs
•Evaluating and assessing social impacts of development projects
•Planning cultural events.
Bachelor of Arts Degree Majoring in Linguistics (Honors)
Vietnam National University, Hanoi, Vietnam
•President of Linguistics Faculty Student Union for 4 consecutive years
Lam Son Gifted High School
Literature Specialized class. 
Thanh Hoa city, Vietnam 
EDUCATION
2014  -  2015
2004  -  2008
2000  -  2004
•Australia Awards scholarship, 2014 – 2015 (masters course), the University 
of Melbourne, Victoria, Australia.
•
Top 5% graduates at Vietnam National University (VNU), GPA 86.5/100. 
The First Award for student science report, 2007 contest, VNU.
•Vietnam National University student ambassador, 2005 and 2007.
•Bank of Tokyo-Mitsubishi UFJ scholarship for top students' performance.
•Third award, National Excellent High School Student Contest for Literature
(2004).
AWARDS
0912. 994. 661
linkedin.com/in/trinhphuongthao
trinhphuongthao86@gmail.com
WORK EXPERIENCE
April 2018- Present
NexEdu Vietnam, Egroup
Marketing Manager
•
Working as the focal point between NexEdu and Skillsoft, the world leading online 
training enterprise to researching e-Learning market in Vietnam, collecting and 
analysizing competitors and market trends. Planning marketing strategy and 
implementation marketing activities to selling Skillsoft e-Learning and other training 
services in Vietnam.
•
Organizing online and offline events for Skillsoft in Vietnam, promoting digital campages 
to educate prospects about trendings in L&D. Digital transformation is the current focus.
•Establishing a network of more than 10 partners to cross-sell NexEdu's products &
services. Placing NexEdu's products on ecommerce platform (such as EdumallX, Go1).
•
Collecting data and running CMS. Working with R&D team to creating new products/
services that fit Vietnames clients. Strategically positioning and branding NexEdu as a
modern training company that leading workplace training in the digital age.
March 2017- April 2018
Doan Thi Diem School, Ecopark
PR & Marketing Manager
•Researching K12 education market to identifying the company's developement
direction and repositioning school’s brand.
•Managing owned media channels (Fan page, YouTube, Website). Increasing Fanpage
followers from 9,000 to 16,000 in 5 months.
•Planning and implementing students recruitment campaigns, targeting parents in
Hanoi and nearby areas. Launching online and offline promotions, and managing
generated leads, recruiting more than 600 students (2016- 2017 intake).
•Organizing about 2-3 promotion events per months (conferences, school visits, open-day)
to welcome parents, future students and partners.
•Working as the focal point between company and more than 15 media outlets.
Vinschool, Vingroup
November 2016 – March 2017
PR & Marketing Coordinator
•
Coornidating marketing and communication activities: creating content, managing 
owned-media channels, generate interests from prospects, and set up digital recruitment 
campaings.
•Event organization: creating concepts, planning details, check list, building task force for
any signing ceremonies, education fair, and cultural fair.
•Managing school's online community which includes 30,000 members, dealing with
major online/offline complains and indentify potential communication crisis to secure
company's reputation.
•
Managing school's online community which includes 30,000 members, dealing with
online/offline customers’ complain to secure company's reputation
Actively seeking for international cooperation opportunities to improve
Vinschool's business.
June 2009 – Nov 2016
Vietnam Ministry of Natural resources and 
Environment (MONRE)
PR and Communications officer
•
Working with international partners (UNDP, JICA, and WWF) to implementing national 
advocacy campaigns that promote the World Environment Day, and the World Ocean Day.
•
•
Working closely with major media outlets, namely VTV, HanoiTV, VTC, VOV, Vnexpress, etc. 
to publish information to the publics. Organizing MONRE’s annual Environmental 
Journalism Awards.
Writing for MONRE’s website and other public communication materials (press releases, 
movie scrip, posters and other communication materials).
January 2008 – September  2009
University of Social sciences and 
Humanities, Hanoi, Vietnam
Vietnamese language teacher
Center for applied linguistics | Faculty of Linguistics
Teaching Vietnamese language and culture for international students from the U.K, 
the U.S, Korea, Russia, etc.
in
WORK TRAINING
Digital skills 
Vietnam Digital 4.0 Program, Google 
Strategic Marketing Planning
*

*

 Skillsoft e-Learning (U.S)
Professional Communication Skills for Leaders 
3 week seminar in Vietnam and Bangkok 
U.S embassy, under Lower Mekong Initiatives
Writing project proposal in ASEAN
2 week training in Vietnam
Embassy of the Republic  of Singapore.

Planning marketing strategy and implementation marketing activities to selling Skillsoft e-Learning and other training services in Vietnam. • Organizing online and offline events for Skillsoft in Vietnam, promoting digital campages to educate prospects about trendings in L&D. Digital transformation is the current focus.
